channel.title: How do I change the max skill level of JUST ONE SKILL
channel.description: Hey, I recently added dungeoneering to my server, and currently, the max skill level for it is 99. I want just dungeoneering's max level to be 120. I want all of the other stats to remain at max level 99. Thank you in advance

item.title: How do I change the max skill level of JUST ONE SKILL
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

If you want any help, add me on Skype. I’ll be on tomorrow

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the max skill level of JUST ONE SKILL

item.title: How do I change the max skill level of JUST ONE SKILL
item.dc:creator: @deathbysniper97 deathbysniper97
item.description:
@deathbysniper97 wrote:

[quote=“Christmas_tree, post:6, topic:477778”]Probably in the client class

The initial main block sent to the client is initialize(). This loads the tabs and the icons. In normal wL, RefreshSkills() is used to contain what needs updating in the skills interface I believe.[/quote]
Okay, i think i get where youre coming from
Thank you:3

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the max skill level of JUST ONE SKILL

item.title: How do I change the max skill level of JUST ONE SKILL
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

Probably in the client class

The initial main block sent to the client is initialize(). This loads the tabs and the icons. In normal wL, RefreshSkills() is used to contain what needs updating in the skills interface I believe.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the max skill level of JUST ONE SKILL

item.title: How do I change the max skill level of JUST ONE SKILL
item.dc:creator: @deathbysniper97 deathbysniper97
item.description:
@deathbysniper97 wrote:

[quote=“Christmas_tree, post:4, topic:477778”][quote author=deathbysniper97 link=topic=595974.msg4196137#msg4196137 date=1357515564]

Server base?

PI
[/quote]

The amount of people that have said that…

Ok, you could just find another server with this already in and rip it, or you can do some self investigation into sending text to interface and on-screen updating[/quote]

Hmm… I think I will self-investigate it. Do you have any idea on what .java file it would be in? I am completely lost in my source at the moment and have not the slightest clue where to search

Read full topic
